keywords.value: Dallas, Tex, Shooting of Police Officers (2016)
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Chief Brown did not give a reason for his decision but discussed his department’s response to the fatal shooting of five officers in an ambush this summer.

headline.print_headline: Dallas Police Chief Retiring, Weeks After Officers’ Deaths
headline.main: David Brown, Dallas Police Chief, Announces Retirement

snippet: Chief Brown did not give a reason for his decision but discussed his department’s response to the fatal shooting of five officers in an ambush this summer....
abstract: Dallas Police Chief David O Brown announces his retirement just eight weeks after five officers were killed by gunman; gives no specific reason for decision and announces no plans.
